name: Rummy Rush - Classic Card Game
description:
THE #1 BEST RUMMY GAME
Introducing the classic rummy game. Enjoy and relax playing the classic Rummy game played around the world for over 100 years, now with a modern twist.

Go Rummy
Use your tactics to play and leave your opponents in the dust! The round ends when one player gets rid of all their cards.

Online Rummy Game
Enjoy "RUMMY RUSH" with players from all over the world. You can now play a fun game with friends anytime, anywhere.

Rummy Game modes
Play the game mode you LOVE to play from the classic Rummy game to the phase challenge.
Gather sets & runs to complete the minimum drop requirement and win the game!
